nen_types.name: transmutation
nen_types.description: change the quality and properties of your aura

nen_types.name: specialization
nen_types.description: develop a different ability as your aura doesn't fall within the other classes

nen_types.name: emission
nen_types.description: detach your aura from your body
nen_types.divination: The colour of the water changed.
